what_it_looks_like.en:
You're in a shooting range, multiple targets at different distances - close, medium, far.

You hold a shooting tool (arrow, ball, laser - depending on type), the requirement: precision, not speed.

Deep breath... fix your gaze on target... calculate angle and distance...

Heart beating calmly, hand steady, focus complete on small point ahead.

You shoot! The sound, movement, waiting... did you hit?

Yes! Red center point lights up - feeling of quiet achievement.

Move to next target, different angle, farther distance - same process, but harder.

The thrill here is gradual improvement - more precise each day, farther each week, steadier each month.

why_you.en:
- You love objective progress measurement - numbers don't lie, improvement is clear and direct
- You lean toward silent mastery - don't need applause or noise, result alone suffices
- You enjoy precise control - every millimeter matters, every angle counts
- Your challenge is internal - you against yourself, trying to beat your previous record

first_week.en:
**First Week - Building Foundation:**

â€¢ Day 1-2: Gaze fixing - learn to focus on single point without distraction, steady gaze drill

â€¢ Day 3-4: Breath control - link breathing to shooting, always release after exhale

â€¢ Day 5-7: Close targets - start with 3-5 meter distance, 100% accuracy before increasing range

Goal: Build muscle memory for stability and focus

progress_markers.en:
**How You Know You're Progressing:**

âœ“ Your hand becomes steadier - doesn't shake even before shooting

âœ“ Your decisions faster and clearer - know when to release without hesitation

âœ“ Tension disappears completely - shooting becomes natural like breathing

âœ“ You start hitting farther targets - distance increases while precision remains

win_condition.en:
True victory:

â€¢ Consecutive precision streak without sequential errors (streak master)
â€¢ Or reaching new distance while maintaining accuracy (distance challenger)
â€¢ Or breaking your personal score record (score breaker)

Each goal has its thrill, choose your challenge

**VR Version:**

Games like:
â€¢ In Death VR - archery in fantasy worlds
â€¢ The Lab: Longbow - classic shooting precision
â€¢ QuiVR - cooperative bow and arrow challenges

Advantage: Interactive virtual shooting with instant feedback

**Non-VR Version:**

â€¢ Archery at specialized clubs
â€¢ Ball shooting at defined targets
â€¢ Professional darts

You need:
â€¢ Safe foam target boards
â€¢ Shooting tools suitable for level
â€¢ Safe organized space

Advantage: Real muscle training, actual physical coordination development

psychological_hook.en:
**Why You'll Get Hooked:**

This is the sport of visible improvement - every day you see yourself better than yesterday.

No luck, no randomness - everything depends on your training and focus.

Numbers don't lie: your accuracy improves, distance increases, stability strengthens.

After first week, you'll understand why players say:
"Precision is addictive - once you start seeing improvement, you can't stop"
